references.paper_title: Restless bandits: Activity allocation in a changing world
references.reason: This paper introduces the foundational restless bandit problem, which the current paper extends.

references.paper_title: On an index policy for restless bandits
references.reason: This paper provides asymptotic optimality results for Whittle index policies in restless bandits, which are the basis for index policies in the current paper.

references.paper_title: Field study in deploying restless multi-armed bandits: Assisting non-profits in improving maternal and child health
references.reason: This paper demonstrates the real-world applicability of restless bandits in a public health setting, motivating the extension to more general reward functions.

references.paper_title: Optimistic Whittle index policy: Online learning for restless bandits
references.reason: This paper addresses online learning in restless bandits, a relevant consideration for the adaptive policies proposed in the current work.

references.paper_title: An analysis of approximations for maximizing submodular set functions—i
references.reason: This paper provides theoretical foundations for submodular functions, which are crucial for the analysis and algorithms developed in the current paper.
